message: Let's start with a fair split, I'm willing to give you a decent amount to get us started.
You were too generous in round 1, I'll take a bigger share this time
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need a bit more for myself to make this worthwhile.
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve a bit more
I'm starting to feel the pinch of inflation, I need a bigger share to keep up with the cost of living.
I'm not budging, you'll have to make a better offer if you want me to give up more
I'm not getting any younger, and I need to make the most of what's left. I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more.
